TITLE: Episode 86 - Stacey Rudin and The Moral Panic
DESCRIPTION: The Vixens are joined by former litigator, Stacey Rudin, contributing writer for the American Institute for Economic Research. We discuss the importance of playing to our strengths and the division of labor when it comes to standing up to authoritarianism.
